body_html: What's the plan for enabling vectorization for these functions with NEON (128-bit wide) (or AVX512 (512-bit wide)? Vec256 seems pretty AVX2 specific. Is the idea you'd implement it N different times, once for each bitwidth?
body_text: What's the plan for enabling vectorization for these functions with NEON (128-bit wide) (or AVX512 (512-bit wide)? Vec256 seems pretty AVX2 specific. Is the idea you'd implement it N different times, once for each bitwidth?
body: What's the plan for enabling vectorization for these functions with NEON (128-bit wide) (or AVX512 (512-bit wide)? Vec256 seems pretty AVX2 specific. Is the idea you'd implement it N different times, once for each bitwidth?
